attributes.action: Remove District Judge Joanna Dickens from her position.
attributes.additional_details:
District Judge Joanna Dickens said: "If you were adults you would all be going to jail today for a lengthy period of time, such is the seriousness
Read more at http://www.expressandstar.com/news/crime/2017/02/03/teenagers-jailed-after-stone-thrown-at-taxi-hit-pensioner-in-reckless-attack-watch/#IPFbpO7T6yawc2u7.99
attributes.background: For the Lack of sentence handed down to the young men who threw a rock through a Taxi window Fracturing the skull of a 77 year old woman...

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes petitions calling for people to lose their jobs.

Sentences are the responsibility of the courts, which are independent of the Government and Parliament.

Anyone can ask the Attorney General to review a sentence they think is too low, and only one person needs to ask for a sentence to be reviewed. You can find out how to do that here:

https://www.gov.uk/complain-about-low-crown-court-sentence
